refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Multiplatformal/distribution system dumping and comparation. There is also windows version available.

para.screen: help .......... shows help show .......... shows files in package (s) dump .......... creates pkgversions.xml (d) compare ....... creates pkgversions.xml dump and compares it with base.xml (c) check ......... checks system parameters given by commandline comma separated array (b)

all or empty = default default ---------------------------------------------------- pkglist installed package list (s,d) * pkgver installed package versions (s,d) pkgver gcc package versions of one package (s,d) * env environment variables according file (s,d) * hw HW info (s,d) * sys system info (s,d) pkgdescr packages with description (d) * pkgcount number of installed packages (s)

listitem.para: Generates report with equal and current unique (additional) packages (c).
Writes output to different file (c). (default is ./pkgversion.xml)
Comparation returns 1 if there are some packages missing (c).

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.screen:
example1: generate default (short) comparation report: xmlenv compare -b example/base.xml -o example/result-short.html
example2: generate full comparation report: xmlenv compare -v -b example/base.xml -o example/result-full.html --full -v .............. script verbose output -b <xml-file> ... dumped base xml file which we compare to -o <html-file> .. save report to somewhere else --full .......... show in report 1.equal and 2.current unique(additional) packages
example3: dump with comment xmlenv dump -c "before installing dev env"
example4: check installed packages ./xmlenv check pkglist gcc,gdb .. returns 0 ./xmlenv check pkglist gcc,gdb,not-existing .. returns 1
example5: remote backup dumping ssh user@host 'bash /dev/stdin backup' < /usr/bin/xmlenv scp -r user@host:.xmlenv .
